trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>控制項取代，並將功能加入<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>的較舊的版本控制<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>如果您選擇保留以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 屬於 StatusBarPanel 代表個別 面板中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: 屬於 StatusBarPanel 可以包含文字及/或可用於反映的應用程式狀態的圖示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>，可透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制，可擷取、 加入或移除個別的屬於 StatusBarPanel。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 屬於 StatusBarPanel 提供屬性，讓您修改內的面板的顯示行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>屬性來顯示面板中的圖示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用於提供狀態的應用程式中的圖形表示法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>屬性可讓您指定文字及/或圖示面板中的對齊方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保您的面板正確大小以配合面板的文字，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>空間內的屬性，以自動調整大小以配合面板的文字或以填滿剩餘的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>屬性可讓您指定的最小寬度，以確保，它不會取得小於資料可用於顯示面板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項通常用來顯示說明資訊或應用程式的相關狀態資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: 通常，務必在面板中顯示呈現資料的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>每當滑鼠指標停留在面板上顯示資訊的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項通常用來顯示文字的資訊，您也可以提供您自己的顯示類型屬於 StatusBarPanel。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the StatusBarPanel will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>屬性可讓您指定如何將繪製屬於 StatusBarPanel。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>屬性用來顯示值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>屬性 (與圖示，如果在指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>，您可以面板內繪製您自己的資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 繪製面板中的進度列或動畫的圖示，您可以使用這項功能。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the StatusBarPanel class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立屬於 StatusBarPanel 類別的執行個體時，讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需這些值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，下列的讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|100| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|&10; | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|零長度字串。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|零長度字串。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|&100; | 您可以變更這些屬性，透過呼叫另一個屬性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字和圖示狀態列面板內的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性以水平對齊文字及/或圖示指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>內的面板框線的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 文字和圖示可以 left、 right 或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>的中央對齊

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何方法可以獨立定位內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>圖示

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您無法定位圖示的左半部以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>時對齊右邊顯示的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 圖示永遠位於左邊不論文字的對齊方式的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值不是成員的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否狀態列面板自動調整大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>物件設為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>優先於設定為這些面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>具有其 AutoSize 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>會縮短如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>AutoSize 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>需要該空間。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoSize to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用自動調整的內容時，確保<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>正確顯示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項，其中包含一個以上的面板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以包含文字的顯示的文字自動調整面板 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>)，而另一個面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>描繪進度列必須是固定的大小可顯示 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值不是成員的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 開始初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來開始初始化用於表單或為另一個元件所使用的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>方法結束初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BeginInit 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態列面板的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來區別其他面板中的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值不是成員的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化結束<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來結束一個正由另一個元件之元件的初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>方法會啟動初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>和 EndInit 方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示在狀態列面板中的圖示。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性顯示圖示，表示您的應用程式或您的應用程式中的處理序的狀態。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以在此顯示中的圖示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，指出是否正在進行中或已完成儲存作業的檔案。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 沒有任何方法可以獨立定位內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>圖示

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您無法定位圖示的左半部以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>時對齊的文字右側，即使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 圖示永遠位於左側面板的文字，不論文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>代表要在面板中顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許狀態列面板內的寬度的最小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The MinWidth property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: MinWidth 屬性使用時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>自動調整大小太小的寬度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, the MinWidth property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>，MinWidth 屬性會自動設定為相同的值做為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 最小寬度，以像素的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 小於 0 的值指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用至名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: [名稱] 屬性對應至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>索引鍵

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control that hosts the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>裝載狀態列面板的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>內含。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>物件會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項是可透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> ，其中包含 [面板]。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態列面板的樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性表示是否要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>顯示的文字，或是否為主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>管理面板</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>需要繪製、 建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>做為參數傳遞至事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>事件可讓您判斷哪個面板必須繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>也提供<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>您可以使用執行於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>繪圖工作的物件</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值不是成員的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，包含有關資料<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>資料包含關於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態列面板的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性表示的文字會顯示當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，以顯示應用程式中的相關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Text property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可以使用文字屬性，使用者將滑鼠移至功能表上方時顯示說明資訊或顯示名稱和應用程式中開啟檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要將文字對齊文字方塊內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 面板中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態列面板與相關聯的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，以滑鼠指標停留在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>上時，工具提示中顯示其他資訊

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以在其中顯示工具提示提供的資料傳輸速度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>顯示的檔案傳輸狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示工具提示為應用程式中其他控制項，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: 面板的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
trans-unit.target: 擷取包含面板的相關資訊的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含控制項和它所包含的文字的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態列面板內的寬度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Width property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Width 屬性一律會反映的實際寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>並不能小於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自動調整大小的寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 寬度，以像素的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的寬度小於的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>
